definition: to submerge/to immerse/to sink/to keep down/to lower/to drop/deep/profound/heavy

to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing

sentences.english: These deposits are one of the defining characteristics of Alzheimer's disease.
sentences.chinese: 這些沉積物是阿耳茨海默氏病的特徵之一。

sentences.english: It is speculated that the sediment core is not polluted by thallium at present.
sentences.chinese: 由此推測，該處沉積物當前未受到明顯的鉈污染。

sentences.english: So what were heat-loving organisms doing in the freezingsediment of the Arctic?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，北極冰凍的沉積物中的喜溫生物都做些什麼呢？

sentences.english: A two-dimensional axisymmetric finite element model of sampling tube and sediments is built.
sentences.chinese: 建立了取樣管與沉積物接觸的二維軸對稱有限元模型。

sentences.english: Through the analysis ofthe grain of the sediment of the Quaternary of Mt.
sentences.chinese: 九華山第四紀“泥礫沉積物”成因有很大爭議。

sentences.english: The evidence of human activities around Jiangling area was revealed by sporopollen records from sediments in the Jiangling section, Hubei Province.
sentences.chinese: 江陵剖面沉積物孢粉提供全新世早期人類活動的證據。

sentences.english: The deposits of silver obtained are uniform, non-porous and have electrical properties .
sentences.chinese: 所得銀的沉積物均勻，無孔且具有電性能。

sentences.english: Gray and white materials within the lake bed are exposed sediments and salt crusts.
sentences.chinese: 河牀內部的灰色和白色物質顯示出是沉積物和鹽結層。

sentences.english: Widely distributed calcite and aragonite crystal in the cave passage are originated from ancient pool deposits.
sentences.chinese: 洞內大片分佈的石花起源於四大古水池沉積物的存在。

sentences.english: Moreover, the inorganic carbon content was positively correlated with grain-size variation in general.
sentences.chinese: 而無機碳含量總體與沉積物粒度變化呈正相關。

sentences.english: The sediments in the basin can be distinguished into old and new lake facies.
sentences.chinese: 盆地的沉積物可分出老湖相和新湖相。

sentences.english: This sediment will then probably be formed into a folded and imbricated structure.
sentences.chinese: 然後這些沉積物可能形成褶皺和疊瓦構造。

sentences.english: Analysis of sediment source is one of an important content of basin analysis.
sentences.chinese: 沉積物來源分析是盆地分析的重要內容之一。

sentences.english: Abundant information about paleooceanographical environmental changes can be recorded in the deep-sea sediments.
sentences.chinese: 深海沉積物蘊藏了豐富的古海洋環境變化信息。

sentences.english: Also, high temperature in high flow season strengthened secondary release of OCPs from sediment to water.
sentences.chinese: 水溫升高加強了沉積物中有機氯農藥的二次釋放。

sentences.english: We had assumed that the lake-bottom sediments might contain markers of the Tunguska event.
sentences.chinese: 我們假設湖底沉積物可能含有通古斯卡事件的標記。
